title: Postcard from Hawaii
summary: Baby's first mail came arrived today... a ostcard from his Aunt N in Hawaii! He was soooooo excited to read it!

title: First Smile
summary: First smile where he is looking at the camera (and doesn't have gas)! We took so many pictures, but this one is the cutest!!

title: First Swing Ride
summary: Trying out the swing... not too impressed... but he loved watching the other kids swing!

title: Meeting Uncle C
summary: It was a dark and stormy night... Baby finally got to meet his future shred doggie after a long COVID delay

title: Lil Dutch Boy
summary: Cheering on his favourite team, the Netherlands, during the Euros 2021. They lost bad, but he didn't care!

title: First Father's Day
summary: My first Father's Day wasn't very relaxing, as I had to do a Midterm for Swift.

title: Half Year Old
summary: Little dude is growing up so fast!
